bots.name: SMART MACHINE
bots.description: When Viam shifted from a robotics company to a smart machine company, you’d never felt more seen. AI’s all the rage, but it’s no threat to you. You can’t resist a good puzzle, and your brain seems to be an endless repository of random facts. When you’re not helping someone out with tasks beyond your own, you’re busy scrolling Slack looking for places to leave puns.
bots.fatalFlaw: Leaving too many nits on PRs

bots.name: PHILOSOPHER BOT
bots.description: What exactly is a robot? Does free will exist? Is a bump sensor a camera? These are the questions that keep you up at night. You’re constantly asking “why,” coming up with new theories about the things around you, and resisting the urge to say “ontology” over lunch. You love nothing more than a good conversation, except maybe an accurate alignment chart.
bots.fatalFlaw: Asking “is a hot dog a sandwich?” too many times

bots.name: ARTSY BOT
bots.description: You’re charming, open-minded, and . You’ve made multi-course meals with snacks and ingredients from the kitchen. You are an innovator, you’re constantly pushing things to the edge. You enjoy being slightly intimidating, and you are secretly pleased when people respond “I’ve never heard of that.”
bots.fatalFlaw: Your room is always a mess

bots.name: SHORT-CIRCUIT BOT
bots.description: Let’s be honest, you’re not always doing your best work. But when you are, you’re electric! Your comments often catch everyone by surprise. When the inspiration hits, it’s impossible to stop the flow. You’re undoubtedly iconic. There would be no #thrid-floor-chaos without you!
bots.fatalFlaw: Caused the fire in the building

bots.name: BARBIE BOT
bots.description: You genuinely love life, and your enthusiasm is contagious. You feel alive in the spotlight, and you’re (not so secretly) dying to be featured on a Viam “day in the life” vlog. Every outfit of yours is a hit, so obviously you drop a mirror selfie into #ootds on the daily. You know girlboss is supposed to be ironic these days, but you’re not sure why and you’re too afraid to ask.
bots.superpower: Never has a bad hair day

questions.question: How are you feeling today?
options: Good! Ready to take on the day!
None of the above. I contain multitudes

questions.question: What's your favorite corner of the office?
If you could grant a robot any ability, what would you choose?
options: Follow me around like an imprinted duckling

questions.question: Which of the following fictional technologies do you hope is finally made possible by Viam?
My wizard amulet would be made of…
They probably know me personally at…
options: Fuji Sushi – maximize your budget. $20 before tax
Planet Taco – I get lunch AND dinner

questions.question: The wizard is conjuring a generative stew. Quick, grab something from the kitchen to add!
If you could have one Viam component as an extension of your body, what would it be?
If you could be half of a robot-human crime-fighting duo, which one would you be? (Answer truthfully)
